Teaching

2017-2018 – Informatique, Master 1 préparation CAPES

2016-2017 – Projet VET, Master2 SSI, Rennes. I supervised four students on cyber-security on a machine learning project. They implement and analyze the DBSCAN algorithm. Moreover they test it on several datasets et compare it with other common methods.
